name: token-beam-aseprite-plugin
description: Sync design tokens (colors) to Aseprite palette

scripts.install:aseprite: mkdir -p "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Aseprite/scripts/token-beam" && SYNC_URL="${SYNC_SERVER_URL:-ws://localhost:8080}" && sed "s|^local syncServerUrl = \".*\"|local syncServerUrl = \"$SYNC_URL\"|" token-beam.lua > "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Aseprite/scripts/token-beam/token-beam.lua" && cp -f package.json "$HOME/Library/Application Support/Aseprite/scripts/token-beam/"
